**About EVL Gaming, LLC**

We've been providing gaming and VPS services since 2011, and have always owned 100% of our hardware and networking equipment. Our clients also believe that we offer some of the best support in the industry as we never turn anyone away, and always point them in the right direction if they get lost or stuck in their VPS!

EVL Gaming, LLC is registered and is in good standing with the Arizona Corporation Commission since July 2011.

**Hardware Specifications** 
  
  Our SSD nodes run on Opteron 12 core CPU's at 2.7Ghz. The servers also use RAID 10 SSD arrays for a huge boost in IOPS and transfer speeds! 
  
All of our servers utilize Supermicro enterprise grade motherboards, chassis, and power supplies. Here's some proof that we own our infrastructure. This is our actual equipment, not a bunch of stock photos! [View our infrastructure](http://evlgaming.com/infrastructure)
  
**Network Specs** Check out our [network page](http://evlgaming.com/network/) for speedtests, test IP's and more!

 **FAQ's**
  
  *Why do you block email ports on these plans?* -- **This is to prevent email marketing/spammers from utilizing our services. If you are a developer there are many free email delivery services such as [mandrill](http://mandrill.com/) that you can utilize on these plans even with SMTP blocked.**
  
  *Can I use my own windows license I swear I have a real one!* -- **Nope, we no longer allow customers to use their own custom windows licenses.**
  
  *I have a custom iso file can I use it?* -- **Depends on the ISO, but typically yes. We utilize KVM virtulaization and can boot to ISO's. If the iso does not come from a reputable source we'll likely deny your request.**
